author: Staff Reporter
text:
A month-long rural sports competitions in all 95 village panchayats in the district began on January 20.

The rural sports competitions for people of all ages were conducted to develop inter-personal skills, communally harmony, said a release from Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan here on Thursday.

The competitions will be conducted separately for men and women.

There is no age bar for participating in the sports competitions.

Athletic events such as 100 metres, 200 metres and 400 metres running race, long jump, shot put, volley ball, Kabaddi for both men and women and foot-ball matches for men will be held.

Equipments will be given to differently-abled persons and they will be given a certificate of participation.

Interested persons are advised to contact their Panchayat office and participate in the competitions in large numbers, Mr. Chavan appealed.
